title: Integrated Health/Fitness Application (JavaScript/CSS/HTML)
summary: Collaborated with a team to design and implement an HTML/JS/CSS integrated health app, focusing on user-centric interface design and smooth utility for tracking health and exercise goals.
bullets: Designed a health-tracking interface with goal setting, progress visualization, and user reminders.
Developed with responsive layouts and intuitive design patterns for accessibility and cross-device compatibility.
Coordinated development tasks and integrated modules through version control using GitHub.

title: StockTracker (Flask + Python)
summary: Full-stack stock tracking web application with user login, and stock searchs.
bullets: Implemented authentication and session-based user accounts with persistent MongoDB storage.
Built an API-integrated stock search feature that displays ticker data, daily changes, and charts.
Developed watchlist creation and editing capabilities with real-time updates to stock prices.
Designed a responsive TailwindCSS-based UI and deployed on Vercel for peer testing and feedback.

title: Machine Learning Neural Network Models
summary: Implemented perceptron, non-linear regression, digit classification, and language identification neural networks in Python.
bullets: Developed perceptron and multi-layer neural networks from scratch for classification and regression tasks.
Trained and evaluated models on MNIST digits and language identification datasets using custom backpropagation.
Optimized model accuracy through hyperparameter tuning and architectural experimentation.

title: Personal Philosophy Chatbot
summary: Built a web-based philosophy chatbot that answers questions and helps users refine arguments with structured, context-aware responses.
bullets: Implemented a chat UI with conversation history and prompt-handling to support multi-turn Q&A and argument refinement.
Integrated an LLM API to generate responses, with guardrails for safe prompting and clear output formatting.
Designed an interface for exploring topics (ethics, epistemology, consciousness) and generating outlines or counterarguments.
